title: How to Clean Inside a Laptop Computer

steps.headline: Make sure the laptop is switched off and take the battery out.
Unscrew only the screws relevant for the particular part of the laptop you are trying to disassemble.
steps.description: There are signs engraved right under or beside the screw as a guide.

steps.headline: Take all the relevant screws out.
Gently remove the touch pad portion and disconnect its wire from the laptop.
Gently lift the keyboard and also disconnect it from the laptop.
Take your dust removal spray and spray all over the laptop.
steps.description: Concentrate the most on the fan, processor and memory.

steps.headline: Review the results.
steps.description: Once done, the inside of a laptop should look like this.

steps.headline: Put everything back the way it was.
steps.description: Make sure you gently press the connector of a keyboard to connect it to the laptop as well as the touch pad.

steps.headline: Screw again the back of a laptop in the same order.

text: Make sure the laptop is switched off and take the battery out.  Unscrew only the screws relevant for the particular part of the laptop you are trying to disassemble. There are signs engraved right under or beside the screw as a guide. Take all the relevant screws out.  Gently remove the touch pad portion and disconnect its wire from the laptop.  Gently lift the keyboard and also disconnect it from the laptop.  Take your dust removal spray and spray all over the laptop. Concentrate the most on the fan, processor and memory. Review the results. Once done, the inside of a laptop should look like this. Put everything back the way it was. Make sure you gently press the connector of a keyboard to connect it to the laptop as well as the touch pad. Screw again the back of a laptop in the same order.  Enjoy your clean laptop!
sentences: Make sure the laptop is switched off and take the battery out.
Unscrew only the screws relevant for the particular part of the laptop you are trying to disassemble.
There are signs engraved right under or beside the screw as a guide.
Take all the relevant screws out.
Gently remove the touch pad portion and disconnect its wire from the laptop.
Gently lift the keyboard and also disconnect it from the laptop.
Take your dust removal spray and spray all over the laptop.
Concentrate the most on the fan, processor and memory.
Once done, the inside of a laptop should look like this.
Put everything back the way it was.
Make sure you gently press the connector of a keyboard to connect it to the laptop as well as the touch pad.
Screw again the back of a laptop in the same order.
